Class PlayerDetailsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • playertype.Player
      • view.PlayerDetailsManager

  • public class PlayerDetailsManager
extends Player
    Class that deals with the second screen of the program; the player details including the names and colors of each person playing Connect 4.

      Constructor and Description
      PlayerDetailsManager()
      initializes the pane, scene, and stage, creates the background image, adds all the items, including buttons, labels, and icons.
